definition: fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

pinyin: rong2 mao2 xing4 xian4 ji1 su4

sentences.english: The risk assessment of Vespa velutina, the Asian hornet, makes terrifying reading.
sentences.chinese: 关于绒毛黄蜂的危险评估，亚洲黄蜂是最恐怖的。

sentences.english: A weasel has soft under-fur protected by stiff, shiny guard hairs.
sentences.chinese: 鼬的柔软的下层绒毛，由坚硬明亮的针毛保护着。

sentences.english: Some reach for cigarettes, or at least the fluffy white fibers found in their filters.
sentences.chinese: 有些鸟儿抓到香烟，发现过滤嘴上有白色的绒毛纤维。

sentences.english: Nick's favorite toy was a fluffy teddy bear his grandmother had given him.
sentences.chinese: 尼克最喜欢的玩具是祖母给他的绒毛玩具熊。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT Choriocarcinoma is one of solid tumors which are sensitive to chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 绒毛膜癌是一种对化疗敏感的实体肿瘤。

sentences.english: The microfilament in the microvilli and pseudopodia is the motion skeleton of cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: 微绒毛及伪足内的微丝是瘤细胞的运动骨架。

sentences.english: This flannelette is composed of base cloth and flocks.
sentences.chinese: 这种布由底布和绒毛组成。

sentences.english: Villi are not present. Rather, there is a proliferation of bizarre trophoblastic cells.
sentences.chinese: 绒毛不存在，明显异型性的胚胎滋养层细胞增殖显著。

sentences.english: Villous edema and trophoblast of cell proliferation without clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 绒毛水肿和滋养叶细胞增生无临床意义。

sentences.english: The time for sampling is suggested between 6-7 gestation weeks.
sentences.chinese: 提出绒毛取材时间以孕6～7周最适宜。

sentences.english: Only in midgut there was structure of the typical microvilli.
sentences.chinese: 仅中肠表面具典型微绒毛结构。

sentences.english: A row of the hairs fringing the eyelid.
sentences.chinese: 一种在干上有向上的绒毛的植物。

sentences.english: The normal big, fluffy, white feathered wings.
sentences.chinese: 正常大小，绒毛状的，白色羽毛型的翅膀。

sentences.english: Villi in the small intestine increase the surface area of the gut, which helps in the absorption of food.
sentences.chinese: 小肠绒毛增加了小肠的表面积，有助于营养吸收。

sentences.english: The width of the undercoat is varies depending on where it is on the cat.
sentences.chinese: 绒毛宽度是依赖于猫身上的部位而改变。

sentences.english: He set straight the fluffy shade on the unlighted lamp.
sentences.chinese: 他全神贯注地整理那盏没有点亮的灯上的绒毛灯罩。

definition: white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]
